title: Tether freezes Ledger exploiter’s address
description:
In a move to mitigate the aftermath of the recent Ledger Connect Kit hack, Tether has proactively frozen the hacker’s address. Tether CEO Paolo Ardoino announced the freeze on social media hours after the hacker stole roughly $484,000 through a wallet drainer. The move aims to prevent further unauthorized transactions and safeguard the assets of […]

The post Tether freezes Ledger exploiter’s address appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Russia to treat export of crypto mining as a commodity
description: If Russia's proposed bill becomes law, it could reshape geopolitics by allowing the country to convert its energy resources into mined crypto

title: Pope Calls for International Treaty to Regulate Artificial Intelligence
description: Pope Francis has issued a compelling call for an international treaty to regulate the development and ethical use of artificial intelligence (AI). In his annual message for the World Day of Peace, the Pope emphasized the urgent need for AI to align with human values such as compassion, mercy, morality, and forgiveness. This appeal comes […]

title: AI in Education: Transforming Learning for a Future-Ready Generation
description: The adoption of artificial intelligence (AI) in education is reshaping traditional learning and teaching methods, ushering in a transformative trend with far-reaching implications. In the rapidly evolving landscape of educational technology, the integration of AI tools into classrooms is seen as an essential step to bridge the gap between students, educators, and revolutionary AI-driven tools. title: Google Offers Free Access to Gemini Pro for Developers
description: Google has unveiled Gemini, a cutting-edge AI model lineup that includes Ultra, Pro, and Nano variants. Of particular interest to developers and enterprises is Gemini Pro, which promises advanced AI capabilities for applications. title: Dogecoin Could Become Payment Currency for Tesla Cybertruck
description: Dogecoin is mentioned in Tesla Cybertruck source code, potentially pointing to DOGE payments for its electric pickup truck. Elon Musk backs Dogecoin, which is showing a rise in the market as speculation about its use in Tesla purchases. There are rumors that could be a game changer for Dogecoin (DOGE) and for all those eagerly [...]

title: Legal Expert Contests Claims of Lawsuit Restraining XRP’s Growth
description:
Bill Morgan, a prominent attorney known in the crypto community for his pro-XRP stance, is now challenging the widely held belief among the XRP Army that the regulatory lawsuit significantly impacted the price of XRP. In a recent tweet, a researcher from 3T Warrior Academy proposed that XRP is in the process of forming the […]

The post Legal Expert Contests Claims of Lawsuit Restraining XRP’s Growth appeared first on Coin Edition.
